GeneDef.label: hybrid implanter
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can copy part of the genetic information of another person through a somewhat gross-looking injector organ, and combine it with part of their own genetic information, thus creating a hybrid.

customEffectDescriptions.li: <color=#8a8ae6>Copies</color> half of the <color=#8a8ae6>target's genes</color> and combines them with half of the <color=#8a8ae6>carrier's genes</color>.
Genes are chosen randomly, but for each geneset they are <color=#8a8ae6>predetermined in advance</color>.
If the total <color=#8a8ae6>metabolism</color> does not fit into the limit between <color=#8a8ae6>-5 and +5</color>, then the hybridization will fail.
Regardless of the result, the ability will go on a 5 day cooldown.

AbilityDef.label: hybrid implanter
AbilityDef.description: Copy half of the genetic information of another person through a somewhat gross-looking injector organ, and combine it with half of caster genetic information. This will result in the reset of all caster genes and the loss of half of those already implanted.
